pnp:ListInstance.Title: Form Templates
pnp:ListInstance.Description: This library contains administrator-approved form templates that were activated to this site collection.

pnp:ListInstance.Title: Site Assets
pnp:ListInstance.Description: Use this library to store files which are included on pages within this site, such as images on Wiki pages.

pnp:ListInstance.Title: Style Library
pnp:ListInstance.Description: Use the style library to store style sheets, such as CSS or XSL files. The style sheets in this gallery can be used by this site or any of its subsites.

pnp:CanvasControlProperty.Value: We’ve made several improvements to your health plan, compensation, the process for time and absence reporting, and the holiday calendar.

Your health plan

We’ve improved our health benefits program to include increased medical benefits and enhanced prescription coverage. Learn about each of your health benefits:​​​​​​​

  • Medical
  • Vision
  • Prescriptions
  • Long-term disability

pnp:CanvasControl.JsonControlData: {"id": "0f087d7f-520e-42b7-89c0-496aaf979d58", "instanceId": "d6400b68-614b-4e0c-b3ef-71a93dafaf5f", "title": "Button", "description": "Add a button with your own label and a link on your page", "dataVersion": "1.0", "properties": {"alignment":"Left"}, "serverProcessedContent": {"htmlStrings":{},"searchablePlainTexts":{"label":"Enroll for new benefits"},"imageSources":{},"links":{"linkUrl":"{site}/SitePages/HR-resources"}}, "dynamicDataPaths": {}, "dynamicDataValues": {}}

pnp:CanvasControlProperty.Value:
Compensation

We value the critical work of our teachers, staff, and administrators to educate and prepare students for their next steps in an increasingly complicated world. We believe in fostering an environment that rewards you for building strong relationships with students and parents as well as driving academic achievement.

Compensation is a total package defined by our school district that includes salary, extra pay, benefits, and pension. ​​​​​​​

pnp:CanvasControl.JsonControlData: {"id": "0f087d7f-520e-42b7-89c0-496aaf979d58", "instanceId": "274d8098-493b-460f-a1eb-9bc3f5b29d25", "title": "Button", "description": "Add a button with your own label and a link on your page", "dataVersion": "1.0", "properties": {"alignment":"Left"}, "serverProcessedContent": {"htmlStrings":{},"searchablePlainTexts":{"label":"Learn more "},"imageSources":{},"links":{"linkUrl":"{site}/SitePages/HR-resources"}}, "dynamicDataPaths": {}, "dynamicDataValues": {}}

pnp:CanvasControlProperty.Value:
Time and absence reporting

We have a new district-wide online form defined by the school district to report time and absence reporting. The online form is designed to streamline the reporting process.​​​​​​​

pnp:CanvasControl.JsonControlData: {"id": "0f087d7f-520e-42b7-89c0-496aaf979d58", "instanceId": "2da211e8-edb8-43e0-8709-9c3f61c7e06d", "title": "Button", "description": "Add a button with your own label and a link on your page", "dataVersion": "1.0", "properties": {"alignment":"Left"}, "serverProcessedContent": {"htmlStrings":{},"searchablePlainTexts":{"label":"Report time off"},"imageSources":{},"links":{"linkUrl":"{site}/SitePages/HR-resources"}}, "dynamicDataPaths": {}, "dynamicDataValues": {}}

pnp:CanvasControlProperty.Value:
Holidays

A new online holiday calendar makes it easier to see district-wide holidays and teacher workdays.​​​​​​​

pnp:CanvasControl.JsonControlData: {"id": "0f087d7f-520e-42b7-89c0-496aaf979d58", "instanceId": "eae2c90f-75b0-4f94-a66b-02069078696a", "title": "Button", "description": "Add a button with your own label and a link on your page", "dataVersion": "1.0", "properties": {"alignment":"Left"}, "serverProcessedContent": {"htmlStrings":{},"searchablePlainTexts":{"label":"Online holiday calendar"},"imageSources":{},"links":{"linkUrl":"{site}/SitePages/HR-resources"}}, "dynamicDataPaths": {}, "dynamicDataValues": {}}

pnp:ClientSidePage.Title: Helping students with disabilities reach their full potential

pnp:CanvasControlProperty.Value: As a school, we are committed to providing inclusive, accessible learning environments that inspire confidence and encourage independence for each student.

​​​​​​​​​​​​​​With computer technology, there are several ways we ensure accessibility and inclusion across our learning environments:

  • Use immersive reader technology to improve reading skills for students regardless of their age or ability
  • Use content dictation tools
  • Use word prediction technology to enhance writing skills
  • Use live captions and subtitles in presentations
  • Provide live interpretations in meetings, both online and at live events
  • Use speech recognition software
  • Use an accessibility checker to ensure all content is accessible
  • Ensure screen readers are available on all devices
Here are several tools and resources we are using that are designed to help us accomplish these goals.

pnp:CanvasControlProperty.Value:
Templates can you help you get started creating an organized and thorough lesson plan for your classes. 

  • Basic

Organize lesson plans daily with this accessible contemporary black and white template.

  • Project based

Use this template for guidance in creating your next project-based lesson.​​​​​​​

Example

Here’s an example of the Basic lesson plan template


Lesson title

SUBJECT

TEACHER

GRADE

DATE





phases

TEACHER GUIDE

STUDENT GUIDE

OBJECTIVES



INFORMATION



VERIFICATION



ACTIVITY



SUMMARY



REQUIREMENTS

RESOURCES

NOTES

Giving your students a report template is a great way to give them a starting point and help them organize their information. Consistently organized and formatted reports also make reading and grading reports easier for you.

Here is a collection of report templates you can assign to your students to use:

Simple report

This accessible pre-formatted template includes styles for headings, quotes, numbered and bulleted lists.

Report with cover image

Simple and accessible template that can be used for book reports, history reports, or other school essays.

APA-style report

With specific instructions and formatting based on the APA 6th edition guidelines, this APA template will help save time and prevent mistakes. The template includes details on creating APA compliant charts, layouts, footnotes, and more. This is an accessible template.

MLA-style paper

Does your research or term paper require MLA format? Use this accessible template to help you follow the proper guidelines. Includes styles formatted to match MLA guidelines and instructional text.​​​​​​​
